greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = lcm{1,2,...,n}/denominator of harmonic number H(n).
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
maple: L:= proc(n) L(n):= ilcm(n, `if`(n=1, 1, L(n-1))) end:
mathematica: f[n_] := LCM @@ Range[n]/Denominator[HarmonicNumber[n]]; Table[ f[n], {n, 90}] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_ *)
program: (PARI) a(n) = lcm(vector(n, k, k))/denominator(sum(k=1, n, 1/k)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Mar 07 2018
def A110566(n): return lcm([k for k in range(1,n+1)])//harmonic(n).q # _Chai Wah Wu_, Mar 06 2021
results.author: _Franz Vrabec_, Sep 12 2005
ext: More terms from _Robert G. Wilson v_, Sep 15 2005
